name: FRAME RATE CONTROLLER
desc: Controls the frame rate to optimize game and app performance.

name: TERMAL CONTROLLER
desc: Manages device temperature to prevent overheating during intensive use.

name: CPU OPTIMIZER
desc: Optimizes CPU usage for better performance and energy efficiency.

name: GPU ENHANCER
desc: Enhances GPU performance for a smoother graphical experience.

name: RAM CLEANER
desc: Cleans RAM to improve system speed and stability.

name: BATTERY SAVER
desc: Optimizes power consumption to extend battery life.

name: NETWORK BOOSTER
desc: Improves network connection stability and speed.

name: GAME MODE
desc: Activates a special mode to optimize performance during gaming.

name: STORAGE OPTIMIZER
desc: Optimizes storage usage for better performance.

name: ANTI-LAG
desc: Reduces lag by adjusting the scheduler and process priority.

name: MEMORY COMPRESSOR
desc: Compresses memory to improve RAM usage efficiency.

name: IO TUNER
desc: Optimizes input/output for better read/write speeds.

name: POWER MODE
desc: Adjusts power mode for high performance or energy saving.

name: PROCESS MANAGER
desc: Manages and stops background processes for more optimal performance.

name: DISPLAY TUNER
desc: Adjusts screen refresh rate and resolution for visual performance.

name: CACHE CLEARER
desc: Clears system cache to increase device speed.

name: KERNEL TWEAKER
desc: Tweaks kernel parameters for maximum performance.

name: FPS UNLOCKER
desc: Unlocks FPS limits for a smoother gaming experience.

name: VIBRATION CONTROL
desc: Adjusts vibration intensity for power savings and performance.

name: SENSOR OPTIMIZER
desc: Optimizes device sensors for efficiency and accuracy.

name: BACKGROUND LIMITER
desc: Limits background processes to reduce system load.

name: AUDIO ENHANCER
desc: Enhances sound quality for a better multimedia experience.

name: BOOT OPTIMIZER
desc: Optimizes the device's boot process for faster startup times.

name: LOG CLEANER
desc: Cleans system logs to free up space and improve performance.

name: TOUCH SENSITIVITY
desc: Adjusts touchscreen sensitivity for better responsiveness.

name: STOP MODULE
desc: Stops all active performance modules.
